author: Dr. Susan Berry
title: Teachers’ Unions, Public School Advocates Seek Billions More in Coronavirus Aid
description: Teachers’ unions and other stakeholders in government-run K-12 schools are seeking billions of dollars in funding in coronavirus relief.
content:
Teachers unions and other stakeholders in government-run K-12 schools are seeking billions of dollars in funding in a fourth federal coronavirus relief bill.
Though the most recent coronavirus aid bill provided the U.S. Education Department with almost $31 b… [+5365 chars]
